summary: An email from an FBI agent to another FBI agent regarding work on estimates for Jeffrey Epstein, with an attached case evidence report spreadsheet. The document indicates ongoing investigative work related to Epstein's case in May 2020.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The email mentions working on estimates related to Epstein, indicating he is the central subject of the investigative work.

events.title: Email regarding Epstein case estimates
events.description: An FBI agent sends an email to another FBI agent about working on estimates for the Jeffrey Epstein case, attaching a case evidence report spreadsheet.

keyFacts: The FBI was actively working on estimates related to the Jeffrey Epstein case as of May 2020.
A case evidence report spreadsheet was attached to the email, suggesting organized data collection.
The communication indicates ongoing investigative activity related to Epstein well after his 2019 arrest and death.
